variable.name: ad_mode
variable.value: RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=tvshow, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], silent=true, seasonposter, extrafanart, clearlogo, clearart, banner, seasonbanner, characterart, landscape)
RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, mediatype=movie, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], silent=true, extrafanart, clearlogo, clearart, discart, banner, landscape)
RunScript(script.artwork.downloader, mode=custom, dbid=$INFO[ListItem.DBID], silent=true, extrafanart, clearlogo, clearart, discart, banner, landscape)
